Projects.Title: Projects
Projects.Description1: One of the first projects I developed, using beginner techniques. The task was to create a store with a login page, cart, and support.
Projects.Description2: A school project where we needed to develop a site with carousels, dark mode, and various pages. It was supposed to simulate a store or a computer parts manufacturer. It was my first React project.
Projects.Description3: Started as a school project, my first portfolio evolved into the professional page you are on now! It was my second pure React project.
Projects.Description4: A school project where we needed to develop a site with carousels, dark mode, and various pages. It was supposed to simulate a store or a computer parts manufacturer. It was my first React project.
Projects.Description5: FullStack project made with NextJS and TypeScript, incorporating Tailwind, ShadCN, and Stripe, with a MySQL database.
Projects.Description6: ERP made with NextJS and TypeScript for the E-commerce project, offering complete store management. Libraries such as Clerk, Cloudinary, and ShadCN were used.
